column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''18''' is the eighteenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "The Death of Glaurung" — trans. by [[Patrick H. Wynne]].
* "Ainulindale: 'The Great Music of the Ainur', Part 1" — trans. by [[Craig Marnock]].

* "Words and Devices" (column)<ref>Contents of the column: "Harping on a Theme"; "The Khazâd: Custodians of Hidden Hoards" (by Arden R. Smith); "Letters to W & D": [[Tom Loback]].</ref> — [[Patrick H. Wynne]] and [[Carl F. Hostetter]].

* "Transitions in Translations" (column)<ref>Contents of the column: "I'm a Troll Man"; "Information from the Russian Front" (by [[David Doughan]]); "About Titles in the Russian ''Lord of the Rings''" (by [[Nathalie Kotowski]]); "Armenian/Ukrainian Update".</ref> — [[Arden R. Smith]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
